Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is BULGARIA. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 19 BG.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Rhodope Mountains. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Smolyan Municipality in Smolyan Province (BG424).   The size of the area (km2) is 859.6. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is unspecified. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is unspecified. The total population (in thousand) is 36.475. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 42.43. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) is unspecified. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 63.70. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.06%.   The average per capita income (EUR/year) [Province] is 5400. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Province] is 500. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 8.40%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 38.80%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 52.80%. The per capita income (EUR/year) [Region] is 5600. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Region] is 6888. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 5.90%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 35.20%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 59.00%.   The total number of bed places (BPs) in tourist accommodations/year in the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 10138. The regional (Region) share of total BPs/year is 37.40%. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 20890. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is unspecified. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 20.50%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 38.00%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 41.40%. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 24.20%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 30.70%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 45.10%.   Hunting in the Bulgarian mountains is strictly restricted to designated 'state hunting grounds'. For example, the South-Central State Enterprise - Smolyan - administers 7 hunting grounds with an online system of registration / application for hunting licences. The species most commonly hunted are Red , Roe and Fallow Deer; Wild Boar; Mouflon, and; Chamois. There is also some limited hunting of Brown Bear.   N/A. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current. This VC is classified as Traditional.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is unspecified. The innovation is related to the whole VC. The land use systems involved are N/A. The local assets include Natural.
